TopicTitle: How To Get To Another Planet... And Back?

Articles.Content:
Well I have been to both Mun and Minmus now, but I really want to go to another planet, preferably Duna (Maybe Eve). I literaly have no experience going to another planet but would like some tips, guide links, or ship download links that can get the job done. Thanks.

P.S. Rover links would be great too.

Feel free to check the tutorials section of the forums. If you click advanced search here on the forums and type in interplanetary + select thread titles only you'll find heaps and heaps of threads discussing this topic, it's brought up frequently.

Feel free to check the tutorials section of the forums. If you click advanced search here on the forums and type in interplanetary + select thread titles only you'll find heaps and heaps of threads discussing this topic, it's brought up frequently.

Alright, thanks.
